Testimonial

“

Principal Stist

The annual cultural gathering at the St Thomas Institute for Science And Technology , TVM (STI) has always been an exciting and most awaited event for all the students over the years. This year 2021 is the 7th edition of YASYA and i wish the event great success and joy for all the participants
